p.span: New Student Enrollment Applications are available in the main office.

h2.a: Continuity of Learning and COVID-19 Response Plan

span.style: text-align: left; line-height: 1.2em; background-color: rgb(248, 248, 248); font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;

br.span: Voyageur Academy achieves excellence through dedicated staff members, strong curriculum, excellent parental involvement and a host of extracurricular activities.

span.br:
Voyageur scholars accept personal responsibility as they pursue academic success. Voyageur Academy is a free, public charter school serving students in grades K-12. We are chartered by Ferris State University.
We create and enhance our students' education and strengthen their foundation by providing them with the drive and determination to achieve academic excellence. Students receive a quality, well-rounded education through consistent discipline, intense focus and continuous hard work. Ultimately, we prepare all our students for success in high school, college and society.

Monday - Friday
8:15 a.m. - 3:30 p.m.
Office Hours
Mon-Thurs: 7:30 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.
Fridays: 7:30 a.m. - 4:00 p.m.
